thread.title: Bautista brings hope, then heartache as Jays fall to Royals
thread.title_full: Bautista brings hope, then heartache as Jays fall to Royals

author: ROBERT MACLEOD
title: Bautista brings hope, then heartache as Jays fall to Royals
text:
Toronto Blue Jays right fielder Jose Bautista sits in the dugout during the seventh inning in Game 6 of baseball's American League Championship Series against the Kansas City Royals on Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Kansas City, Mo. (Matt Slocum/AP) Bautista brings hope, then heartache as Jays fall to Royals ROBERT MACLEOD KANSAS CITY, MO. â€” The Globe and Mail 
Published Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015 6:40AM EDT 
Last updated Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015 6:47AM EDT 
It will be analyzed over and over, by the experts on sports television shows to the average Joe raising a glass or two in the local saloon, talking about the play that led to the downfall of the Toronto Blue Jays. 
Should Jose Bautista have thrown to second base like he did in the bottom of the eighth inning that provided Lorenzo Cain the small opening he needed to score the winning run for the Kansas City Royals from first base? Never miss out
